original_text: Yet they did not listen or incline their ear, but stiffened their neck, that they might not hear and receive instruction.
korean_text: 그들은 순종하지 아니하며 귀를 기울이지 아니하며 그 목을 곧게 하여 듣지 아니하며 교훈을 받지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Yet they did not listen or incline their ear
that they might not hear and receive instruction.
sentences.korean_translation: 듣고 훈계를 받지 못하게 하려 함이라
